repo.description: Configuration for strings, files, and file paths to replace in target file

url.description: Git url of project to plagiarize

checkout.description: Branch, tag, or commit to checkout from project to be plagiarized

strings.description: Strings to find in target project and be replaced with plagiarized project's values

vars.description: Variables available to be used for finding and replacing by variable name. For example `$var_name: hello` would replace string '$var_name' with 'hello' in target project
